DataElement.preferredName: Primary Care Doctor Discussion Other Smoking Cessation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether a person discussed other smoking cessation interventions with their primary care physician.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Primary Care Provider Discussion Other Smoking Cessation Intervention
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A medical professional who provides, coordinates, or helps a patient access a range of health care services. This is usually a medical doctor (MD), but may also be a Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine, nurse practitioner, clinical nurse specialist, or physician assistant, as allowed under state law._An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Any intervention designed to reduce and eliminate an individual's smoking.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A doctor who manages a person's health care over time. A primary care doctor is able to give a wide range of care, including prevention and treatment, can discuss cancer treatment choices, and can refer a patient to a specialist._An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.

Concepts.definition: A medical professional who provides, coordinates, or helps a patient access a range of health care services. This is usually a medical doctor (MD), but may also be a Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine, nurse practitioner, clinical nurse specialist, or physician assistant, as allowed under state law.
An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._No value exists.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Any intervention designed to reduce and eliminate an individual's smoking.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools
